title: Box shares jump 8% on hedge fund investment
text: Shares of Box Inc. BOX, +1.50% rose 8% in extended trading Tuesday after activist hedge fund Starboard Value disclosed in a regulatory filing that it has a 7.5% stake in the cloud software company. The investment makes Starboard the third-largest shareholder in Box, after Vanguard and BlackRock. Starboard also has ownership stakes in Marvell Technology Group Ltd. MRVL, -2.84% and Symantec Corp. SYMC, -1.12% Box shares are down 12% this year. The S&P 500 index SPX, -0.69%, by comparison, is up 16%.
